title: Implement left sidebar navigation with Analyze/Recommend/Execute tabs
description:
Implemented new navigation structure:
- Left sidebar with tenant name and logged-in user
- 3 nav sections: Analyze, Recommend, Execute
- Welcome to Consequential.io message
- Date range picker calendar control
- Removed TL/WH references
- Deselect all on Recommend page by default
- Progressive nav enabling based on workflow
